data.title: High-end lunch café
data.text: Nordstroms cafeteria is a great place for lunch. I go there often. It's convenient and located in McArthur mall on third floor of Nordstrom's. Great salads and a large selection of main dishes that will always please any appetite. Dry there woodfired pizza or the asian chicken salad.

data.title: Good, but pricey!
data.text: We have eaten here several times, and like the French Dip best. The Carrot Cake is also good. It is pricey, but good quality..

data.title: Always good, always fresh & friendly!
data.text: Food is always fresh, service always friendly.  Beautiful surroundings, delicious desserts. The best soda fountain in Virginia!  What else can I say? It's our secret, but we want to share it with you!

data.title: All time favourite
data.text: Eat here at least twice a month. Food good. Great place for a late lunch. Love getting g my points too.

data.title: Hidden Gem
data.text: This has to be the very best spot in the mall to take a break from shopping and actually get real quality food and drink. Their pizzas are excellent, the sandwiches are great. You can also have a beer or two if you like. Kind of a great man cave while the women folk shop.

data.title: Delicious lunch
data.text: Chicken club sandwich was the best, but also liked the cranberry turkey sandwich, turkey club grill and chicken bacon ranch pizza. The tomato basil soup was wonderful, esp the cracker/bread that comes on top. Got some nordi bars and saw some gorgeous cupcakes. Always eat here when we come to MacArthur mall.

data.title: A Hidden Gem
data.text: Nordstrom's is a hidden gem! I have visited the cafe on numerous occasions, especially when working in the downtown area and the quality of food and service still remains the same - top notch. Today's visit however prompted me to express my appreciation for great customer service. I had the pleasure of being served by one of their best waiters who remembered me from times past. He was so kind as to heat up my rolls, remembered my drink of choice and all with a smile. It was during lunch and the restaurant was extremely busy. While some would agree the prices tend to be on the high side, the service received makes it worth it!

data.title: Delicious food
data.text: We went to this cafe prior to Black Friday shopping.  All of our food was great!  Service was good.  The only issue was the pizza oven was backed up so the pizza came out after everyone else had finished.  Without us asking, the server brought us our money back for the pizza.  That was a nice surprise!

data.title: Lunch/dinner
data.text: You wouldn't think that a department store would have great food, but at the Nordstrom's cafe it did! The food was great ... I had the Niçoise salad with salmon. Very good! My sister had the crab Mac & Cheese and that was very good, however it could have use more & bigger chunks of crab. The table service we got, but I forgot the guy's name (he worked on 9/21/15 early evening) was fabulous! He had a great personality & provided great table service!

data.title: lunch
data.text: We go here maybe one or two times a year food is very good but on the high side for the amount you get but something different a nice place, but this time they had taken the childs pizza off the menu which was just right for me . so order French dip came back almost raw the server we had just sucked from the word go. For the money its not worth it any more to us.

data.title: Delicious food and even better service!
data.text: I come here several times a week for lunch. I've had everything on the menu at least several times and there is not a single thing I dislike. Everything is fresh and delicious. I love that all of their ingredients are organic and the chef is always trying new specials. It's also nice that you can get most menu items in a half portion. Most of all the staff is superb and treats every customer, not just regulars like me, like family. They will go above and beyond to satisfy every customer and I've witnessed some extremely demanding customers but they still serve them with grace and professionalism. This might just be a little cafe in the mall but it's one of my favorite places to eat in Norfolk!

data.title: Shopping Oasis
data.text: Nice department store cafe. Pleasant, serene decor. Serves good soup, sandwiches, salads, wood-fired pizza, a few hot dishes and excellent deserts. Beverages include tea, great coffee, wine and soft drinks. It is slightly pricey for a serve yourself, cafeteria style eatery. Recommend it if you're looking for a relatively quiet place in the mall.

data.title: Fantastic Lunch Venue
data.text: Had a fantastic business lunch there the other day and cannot say enough good things about this wonderful bistro.  Tucked away on the third floor of Nordstrom's third floor, this place never ceases to AMAZE!!!  GreAt food! attentive service and a quiet atmosphere, we were able to conduct business, socialize a bit and leave sated.  If you are in Norfolk, this is a must visit a place.  You will not be disappointed!!!

data.title: My go-to hometown FAVE!
data.text: Love the quality and variety of the food as well as the friendly staff. Never have to worry about a bad chew or a big bill.

data.title: Wonderful Surprise
data.text: Upstairs at the south-eastern end of Nordstrom's my wife and I found this great restaurant.  All the locals know about it as it was very busy.  A nice diverse menu with visual examples of almost everything so you will know what you will be getting.  It is a buffet line where you can get a tray or not, start with soup or salad or not, move on to a lovely choice of delicious looking sandwiches of plates of pasta.  You end up with deserts and drinks to choose from.  I had a wonderful pasta and chicken dish along with a bowl of soup, my wife had a pizza and shared the soup, good choices both.  After ordering you sit down and the food is brought to you.  Quick and friendly service, we look forward to returning.

data.title: Love this cafe! The food is 5 stars.
data.text: This cafe on the 3rd floor of Nordstrom has been my first choice for lunch when in the MacArthur Center since the mall opened.That must be at least 15 years. I don't eat in the food court, but have eaten in every restaurant that has ever been in the mall. Nordstrom is still first choice with me. I have eaten every salad they have ever had and like them all. There are several salads they discontinued that I would like to see return. Yes, the price has gone up over the years. The price has gone up at all the grocery stores and restaurants also. My husband actually eats salad here,too. But he prefers the beef sandwich or the pizzas. It is hard to resist the desserts. I admit the carrot cake is delicious. I realize that mixed fruit cup is a better choice health-wise. When my husband is with me, we take home two of the irresistable cookies. I'd rate Nordy as 5 stars for the quality of food, but since it is not full service I go with 4 stars overall.

data.title: always reliably delicious!
data.text: The food is consistently great, and the desserts are amazing.  The service is wonderful too, even when they're busy.  We'll return again and again!

data.title: One of my favs!!
data.text: I just love Nordstrom's Cafe. I eat here at least twice a week & could probably eat here everyday. I enjoy everything about this place. The staff, the prices, the food, the atmosphere and the location. If you are looking for good food this is your place!!

data.title: Always excellent
data.text: Had lunch here with some friends on a Saturday!  Food was excellent.  Friendliness of staff was good.  The meal was a little pricey, but not too bad.  Cheesecake was good as always.

data.title: This is MacArthur Malls best dining secret
data.text: Skip the food court inside of Nordstroms is a cafe. It's reasonable prices the make most things fresh. They have sandwiches, roaster vegetables and meats, at least 2 soups. It's fast and it's a hybrid between a cafeteria type place and a restaurant. You carry your tray and select your items but then a waitress brings your food to the table.
